General.Name: OFCO Industrial
General.Description: OFCO Industrial Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of fastener products in Taiwan. Its products include screws, nuts, bolts, and structural applications. The company was formerly known as Oriental Fastener Industry LTD. and changed its name to OFCO Industrial Corporation in 2004. OFCO Industrial Corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
